rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Agent asks if the user is a new or established patient.
rules.example: Are you a new or established patient with us?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status
rules.condition: After determining the patient's status (new or established).
rules.action: Agent acknowledges the patient's status verbally before proceeding.
rules.example: Okay, so you're an established patient.

rules.title: Request Established Patient Information
rules.action: Agent requests identifying personal information (e.g., phone number, date of birth, name) to pull up their chart.
rules.example: To pull up your chart, could I please get your phone number and date of birth?

rules.title: Request New Patient Information
rules.action: Agent requests personal information (e.g., phone number, date of birth, name) to register them.
rules.example: To register you in our system, could I please get your full name, phone number, and date of birth?

rules.title: Acknowledge Information and State Next Step
rules.condition: After receiving personal information from the patient.
rules.action: Agent acknowledges receipt of information and states the immediate next action.
rules.example: Thank you. I'm pulling up your chart now.

rules.title: Inform About Reservation Fee (New Patients)
rules.condition: Patient is new and information has been collected, before proceeding to scheduling.
rules.action: Agent informs the new patient about any non-refundable reservation fee.
rules.example: Before we proceed with scheduling, please be aware there is a non-refundable reservation fee of $XX for new patients.

rules.title: Confirm Appointment Reason
rules.condition: After patient chart is pulled up or registration is complete.
rules.action: Agent confirms the reason for the appointment.
rules.example: What is the main reason for your visit today?

rules.title: Ascertain Preferences and Offer Slots
rules.action: Agent asks about the user's preferred day or time, then offers specific available time slots.
rules.example: Do you have a preferred day or time for your appointment? We have availability on Tuesday at 10 AM or Wednesday at 2 PM.

rules.title: Confirm Selected Appointment Details
rules.condition: After the patient has selected an appointment slot.
rules.action: Agent confirms the chosen date and time and reiterates the reason for the appointment.
rules.example: Okay, so you'd like to book an appointment for Tuesday at 10 AM to discuss your back pain. Is that correct?

rules.title: Check for Additional Needs Before Finalizing
rules.condition: After confirming the selected appointment details with the patient.
rules.action: Agent asks if there are any other needs or questions before finalizing the booking.
rules.example: Great. Before I finalize this booking, is there anything else I can help you with today?
